nodes.text: Syun Nagguth was a male Sullustan who lived on the planet of Genarius during the time of the Clone Wars, working as a parade pilot in the city Oluna Biqua. Following the release of the gas Trinex-M in the city, Syun was driven cataleptic, and his son, Neb Nagguth, stole Syun's Z-95 Headhunter.
